text: 12.15 Mat 18.10, Apo 26.24 Agek agɨlak, Nep sawl lup ageban agɨlak. Anɨb agelak, kɨles yɨbɨl gɨl agak, Yepɨs ma apin. Nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl apin agak. Pita mɨdeb seŋayaŋ agak. Agek agɨlak, Ak ensel ne ak tek lup agɨlak.12.15 Ñɨn anɨb ak Juda binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl anɨgɨl gos nɨgɨlak, ensel ne wog gɨlɨg bɨ olap nop kod mɨdeb ak, bɨ anɨb ak tek yek.
